name: Chapati
description: A round flat unleavened bread of India that is usually made of whole wheat flour and cooked on a griddle.

name: Pickle
description: A pickle is a food that's made by soaking vegetables in brine or vinegar. If you are wondering what that crunchy green wedge beside your sandwich is, it just may be a pickle.

name: Curd
description: Curd is obtained by coagulating milk in a sequential process called curdling. It can be a final dairy product or the first stage in cheesemaking.

name: Sweet
description: Gulab jamun is an Indian dessert of fried dough balls that are soaked in a sweet, sticky sugar syrup. As per tradition, the syrup has a delicate rose flavour: Gulab means 'rose water' and jamun refers to a berry of a similar size and colour.

name: Dal Makhni
description: Traditional dal makhani is made with whole black lentils (urad dal, also known as black gram lentils), red kidney beans (rajma), butter, and cream.

name: Paneer
description: An Indian vegetarian dish made with cottage cheese cooked with tomatoes-onions-bell peppers- and a blend of Indian spices.
